question: Hello Everyone,I've been meaning to post this question, and I lo-and-behold, can you imagine, I KEEP FORGETTING!  Anyway, I'm sorry for my bold loud words for anyone having fatigue issues, and waking you up!What do you do for a person who needs to resort to steroid use for the MS sx, or for ON, who is also diabetic?I've, in the past, because of Lupus, which they suspect I never had.  Anyway, I have been on rounds of prednesone for the Lupus, usually 12 day course at a time, and boy it makes my blood sugar soar.  So, I do have ON, but my Opthamalogist only put me on the steroid drops, but never received any oral, or IV steroids like my sister. She was dx MS very quickly though.  Anyway, what do they usually use for diabetics?  Sandie
title: STEROIDS FOR ON, AND DIABETES
